name: Sylvacoin
body: Watch live video from SylvaCoin on www.twitch.tv Hi folks! My name's Sterling AKA SylvaCoin, Sylva, or Coin. I've been gaming since Dos (King's Quest) before I became 6'8" (really). I used to "break" games for a living. My focus is on entertainment, discussion, and chat interaction. I don't generally follow the "meta." I like to shape it myself with inventive play styles that are a challenge. I like to play the class or character that's considered the most difficult to use. Or play a game on its highest difficulty. Which leads to a unique and memorable experience for you and me. :) After I'm able to maintain my stream. I plan on donating 20% of every future contribution to a charity. I also plan on doing giveaways. Setting up points (Coins) for viewers to earn. And overall improve the channel's content. My goal is to earn partner of Twitch, and have that coin be the sub icon for the cents! :) Tips are not expected, but sincerely appreciated! Any contribution supports my desire to maintain streaming full-time instead of taking this government job. Top Investors! The_White_Light: $148.00 o0talula0o: $55.00 Acydwarp: $50.00 Barglenis: $50.00 YOURAWESOME: $21.00 Hounding: $20.00 Jookz: $17.01 Smooth: $14.60 Beckiesweckers: $10.00 (FIRST INVESTOR) Apollyon: $10.00 DunnoxBurfoot: $10.00 DDrogba: $10.00 Tharnosil: $10.00 Nin10dont: $10.00 Monday to Friday: 8:00 PM PST Saturday: Check Twitter! Sunday: Check Twitter! I tweet often before I'm going to air! So be sure to keep in the loop! And if you'd like to suggest a time I go live, be sure to message me with the day and time zone of your request! No links without permission. This is the internet. Swear all you want. But nothing sexually explicit. No backseat gaming...unless Coin asks. No spoilers or hints. Some people wait until the series ended to binge. No spamming of symbols to flood chat No personal information No drama. There's enough drama in our lives. My chat is not a place for it. Don't detract from what this community is about. If you are timed out or banned: I'm very selective of my moderators. I trust their discretion. My rules are mostly common courtesy. If you have been timed out or banned, there's probably a reason for it. I will read your side if you message me. And then decide from there. My moderators not only keep my channel chat running smoothly, but they also enhance the viewing experience. They do this by being helpful in chat, enforcing the rules, and stimulating conversation. Interested in helping this community out? Below is what I'm looking for in a moderator. If you agree with then send me a message! Tell me what you think these mean to you. Put some effort in your message. The core qualities of a moderator: 1. Channel and chat presence 2. Patient and Aware 3. Objective, fair, yet firm 4. Team and Yourself So tell me what that means to you, and if you have any past moderator experience, list and provide some information about it in the message. Along with anything you'd like me to consider. Thanks! :D Featured Streamers Yanoobshow A 14-year old kid who is already on his way to a career as a gamer! He is playing a lot of Cross Fire Sacplayin A very good friend who once was a random gamer at first. He plays games from LoL to Evolve to Dark Souls. JonSandman This guy represents all the values I have as a streamer. Norso20 This streamer focusses on chat interaction. And is addicted to agar.io. Also a vet! Respect. Joker4ev4 This guy is very entertaining. Whatever he plays is enjoyable. Chill guy. No longer looking for Graphic Artists. THANK YOU! Still need people with video editing, and flash prowess! If you're interested in volunteering to help make this channel and my videos more aesthetically pleasing please message me! sylvacointv@gmail.com. DO I HAVE TO WIN? Given the choice to win against someone worse than me or lose to someone better, I'll always choose the latter. Because then there's a challenge. And I play to have fun. And try strategies most won't. META I do not play the game just to follow what everyone else is doing because it's what's winning/best. If you challenge the meta, you can change it. PAY2WIN, PAY2WIN-NOW, and PAY2PLAY Pay2Win:Not all available content is provided with the released title. This is going to diminish a game's community. Pay2Win-Right-Now:The free option of grinding to upgrade is available. Look at Diablo III. I grinded, and farmed in order to get gear so I could solo Diablo on Inferno. That's one way of playing it. With the introduction of the real money auction house, players could just buy whatever items they wanted for a quick, casual game. Same thing for the current raged about game, Hearthstone. Yes, you can use cash to buy packs. You can also use gold. But note: you still have to open the packs. Spending money doesn't increase your odds. Pay2Play:The most current example I can think of is Evolve. The game is $60. But if you want the additional hunters, it's $25. And the monsters are $15 per. That's absurd. In case you were curious about some behind the scenes info! :) Click the pic to see it in the res of my monitor: 1920 x1080. Yep. Only using one monitor folks! Hmmm. Will work on this as I can remember. Will make a list for what I have recorded, someday. :) + Counter Strike: Source + Diablo II + Diablo III cry it's just auction house + Faster Than Light + Heroes of Newerth + Starcraft + Starcraft: Brood War + Starcraft II + Super Smash Bros. Melee + Super Smash Bros. Brawl sigh + Super Smash Bros. Project M. + The Adventures of Willy Beamish! + Warcraft III: Realm of Chaos + X-Com Enemy Unknown Some classics! + Castelvania: Symphony of Night + Beyond the Beyond + Wild Arms + Altered Beasts + Fire Emblem + The Adventures of Willy Beamish + Discworld + TMNT: Turtles in Time My brother's best friend helped me assemble this beast to get the most for my buck back in 2011. Once upon it was a beast. It needs to evolve! Motherboard: MSI 870A-G54 AM3 AMD 870 SATA 6Gb/s USB 3.0 ATX AMD Graphics Card: MSI N450GTS CYCLONE 1GD5/OC GeForce GTS 450 (Fermi) 1GB 128-bit GDDR5 PCI Express 2.0 x16 HDCP Ready SLI Support ... Processor: AMD Anthlon(tm) II X3 450 Processor 3.20 GHz Power Supply: OCZ ModXStream Pro 600W Modular High Performance Power Supply compatible with Intel Sandybridge Core i3 i5 i7 Intel 4th Gen CPU Haswell and AMD Phenom OS: Windows 7 Ultimate N Broadcasting on OBS Milestones $800/mo to Maintain Streaming Full-Time 100 Twitter Followers 1,000 Followers 100 Viewers 10 Viewers
